properties.name: max_files
properties.docstring: The maximum number of files that can be uploaded.

properties.name: max_size
properties.docstring: The maximum file size (bytes) that can be uploaded.

properties.name: min_size
properties.docstring: The minimum file size (bytes) that can be uploaded.

properties.name: multiple
properties.docstring: Whether to allow multiple files to be uploaded.

properties.name: no_click
properties.docstring: Whether to disable click to upload.

properties.name: no_drag
properties.docstring: Whether to disable drag and drop.

properties.name: no_keyboard
properties.docstring: Whether to disable using the space/enter keys to upload.

properties.name: is_used
properties.docstring: Marked True when any Upload component is created.

properties.name: key
properties.type: value for key, value in props.items() if key in supported_props

properties.name: Args
properties.type: arg_value: The arg tuple to update (if necessary).

properties.name: Returns
properties.type: The updated arg_value tuple when arg is "files", otherwise the original arg_value.
